resources.string: Open Smart Anti-eavesdrop, close Smart Hands-free !
Open Smart Hands-free, close Smart Anti-eavesdrop !

When answering a call, the light sensor will automatically adjust the volume according to the distance between the screen and your face, say, if there is a comparatively long distance, then volume will be turned up accordingly, and vice versa. The function of "Smart Hands-free" will be shut down when the anti-eavesdrop function is opened. Make sure that the light-sensor camera is not blocked out while enjoying this process.

When answering a call, the light sensor will automatically adjust the volume according to the distance between the screen and your face, say, if there is a comparatively long distance, then volume will be turned up accordingly, and vice versa. Make sure that the light-sensor camera is not blocked out while enjoying this process.

If you need to switch the device from normal phone mode to speakerphone feature, you just need to pick it up and hold it to your ear and it will automatically deactivate the speakerphone feature and change to normal phone mode, vice versa. The function of anti-eavesdrop will be shut down when "Smart Hands-free" is opened. Make sure that the light-sensor camera is not blocked out while enjoying this process.

If you need to switch the device from normal phone mode to speakerphone feature, you just need to pick it up and hold it to your ear and it will automatically deactivate the speakerphone feature and change to normal phone mode, vice versa. Make sure that the light-sensor camera is not blocked out while enjoying this process.
Call contact whose message details are currently onscreen when the device is brought near the face.

Thanks to the eye-tracking technology of the front-facing camera, the device screen will "stay" in the same brightness range while you are reading or browsing, enabling you to get rid off "screen down" and enjoy the whole smart experience.
Anytime you pick up the device, it will smartly alert you about the missed calls, new messages and set schedules via normal vibration.
Ringtone volume increases when device is in pocket or bag.
"When light screen mobile phone lock screen interface, over the Palm can be unlocked cell phones near the front - facing camera."

" When you wear gloves touching screen invalid, if an incoming call,you just pick up the phone to the ear,then you can automatically answer the call through gravity sensor and proximity sensor feature."
" When light mobile phone lock screen interface,for 2 seconds to unlock blowing into the microphone."
" When light cell phone screen interface,the palm blowing through .the front -facing camera can lock the screen."
" Thanks to proximity sensor,mobile phone can not be touched when the phone is squeezed in the pocket or slided for the fabric"
"Switch to hands-free mode when you put your phone away"
"if there is a comparatively long distance, then volume will be turned up accordingly, and vice versa"
"Call contact whose message details are currently onscreen"
"the device screen will "stay" in the same brightness range while you are reading or browsing"
"smartly alert you about the missed calls, new messages and set schedules via normal vibration"
"Ringtone volume increases when device is in pocket or bag"
"When light screen mobile phone lock screen interface,hand over top of the cell phone unlocked"
"Turn over the phone it will be muted when you have a call(Glove mode will be closed)"
"Turn over the phone it will be muted when you have a call"
"Got on the phone ring tones from the flat - mounted slowly weakened"
"answer the call immediately when you pick up the phone"
"When light screen mobile phone lock screen interface,for 2 seconds to unlock blowing into the microphone"
"hand over near the cell phone camera unlocked"
Three or more fingers click top of the device and then drag down to lock screen and make screen off
Three or more fingers click top of the device and then drag down to lock screen and make screen off, one finger does the default thing.
"The home key to wake the system"
"hand over near the cell phone camera locked"
"Anti fake touch when should not be touched."
"When Close the holster,it can show the small window including standby, music playback, calling or going and so on, And When open the holster, it can bright screen and unlock automatically."
Open Anti Fake Touch, close Smart Cover !
Open Smart Cover, close Anti Fake Touch !
"Use gestures to operate the phone when screen is power off."
"Turn the music to last one when there is a music playing in background."
"When the screen is off, slide left on it."
"Turn the music to next one when there is a music playing in background"
"When the screen is off, slide right on it."
"When the screen is off, slide up on it."
"When the screen is off, slide down on it."
"When the screen is off, double tap on it."
"When the screen is off, slide char O on it."
"When the screen is off, slide char W on it."
"When the screen is off, slide char M on it."
"When the screen is off, slide char E on it."
"When the screen is off, slide char C on it."
